name: Microeconomics
description: An introductory course in microeconomic analysis, including the theory of consumer behavior, production and cost analysis, market structure, and market failure.

name: Macroeconomics
description: An introductory course in macroeconomic analysis, including the theory of national income, economic growth, business cycles, money and banking, and international economics.

name: Econometrics
description: A course in the use of statistical and mathematical methods in economics, including the estimation and testing of economic models.

name: Development Economics
description: A course in the theory and application of economic analysis to the study of developing economies, including topics such as economic growth, international trade, poverty, and inequality.
